1.Title: Meridian Mapping
1.Description: The equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>. Whenever any squad member takes DMG or recovers HP, the equipper gains <color=#2BAD00>2</color> Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.
